ComicInfo.Title: Second Skin
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ever wonder why they call her Voodoo? Priscilla is about to find out when she meets a Daemonite Shaman prepared to teach her exactly why their alien race is the most feared and hated in all the Omniverse! (Hint: It has surprisingly little to do with their fangs, talons and impenetrable armored hides!) Plus, more about Dr. Jeremy Stone ‹ now the massive Maul ‹ and his efforts to help Priscilla rid herself of her alien genetic heritage... and the awesome price he and Priscilla both must pay in the process. Does that sound like a lot for one issue? Welcome to the world of the all-new, all-different Wildcats... now buckle in and enjoy the trip!
